title: A restricted model for the bounded derived category of gentle algebras
abstract:
We present a restricted model for the bounded derived category of gentle
algebras that encodes the indecomposable objects and positive extensions
between them. The model is then used to count the number of $d$-term silting
objects for linearly oriented $A_n$, recovering the result that they are
counted by the Pfaff-Fuss-Catalan numbers.
